tool_description: Monitors return package shipping status and provides real-time location updates throughout the return journey.

tracking_number.description: Package tracking number from shipping label

carrier.description: Shipping carrier handling the package: ups, fedex, usps, dhl

error_messages: Invalid tracking number: Tracking number not found in carrier system.
Unsupported carrier: Must be one of [ups, fedex, usps, dhl].
Invalid return authorization: Authorization number not found or does not match tracking number.
Carrier API unavailable: Unable to connect to carrier tracking service.
Package status unknown: Carrier has no current status information for this package.
usage: Provide tracking_number, carrier, and return_authorization_number to monitor package status. Tool queries carrier APIs for real-time updates.

current_status.description: Current package status: picked_up, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception

tracking_events.description: Chronological list of tracking events and locations
